channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: Venture Global 将成为第一家购买船队而非租赁船只的美国液化天然气生产商
item.description:
Venture Global will become the first American LNG producer to purchase a fleet rather than charter or lease vessels https://t.co/z9OUnEIIen

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）又获得了六年的俄罗斯总统任期，以加强其在乌克兰的战争并挑战西方国家
item.description:
Vladimir Putin secured another six years as Russia’s president to step up his war in Ukraine and challenge the West https://t.co/lLn7KTPiXe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 曾经深信美联储将在 3 月份开始降息的债券投资者正在向 "更高更久 "的现实投降
item.description:
Bond investors who were once convinced that the Fed would start cutting interest rates in March are surrendering to a higher-for-longer reality https://t.co/OP87oUgzTQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 据路透社报道，Reddit 的首次公开募股获得了四到五倍的超额认购
item.description:
Reddit’s IPO is between four and five times oversubscribed, Reuters reports https://t.co/RRe9vASI5q

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 由于经济出现进一步放缓的迹象，同时失业率呈上升趋势，人们普遍预计澳大利亚央行本周将把利率维持在 12 年来的最高水平。
item.description:
Australia’s central bank is widely expected to hold rates at a 12-year high this week as the economy shows signs of slowing further while unemployment trends higher https://t.co/s6EqroGy8t

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 德国和法国与其他 12 个欧盟国家一道，呼吁欧洲投资银行加强国防融资，作为在俄罗斯入侵的情况下增强欧盟安全的一种手段
item.description:
Germany and France joined 12 other EU countries in calling for the European Investment Bank to enhance its financing for defense as a means to boost the bloc’s security in light of Russian aggression https://t.co/BBnzgkgSKd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: Shift4 Payments 首席执行官贾里德-艾萨克曼（Jared Isaacman）表示，潜在收购方的出价未能 "充分评估 "这家支付公司的价值。
item.description:
Shift4 Payments CEO Jared Isaacman said bids from potential suitors have failed to “sufficiently value” the payments firm https://t.co/JofiTq8XWK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 埃克森公司首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）在其七年任期的前半部分受到了环保人士和投资者的攻击，现在他开始采取攻势，华尔街对他更大胆的立场表示赞赏。
item.description:
Exxon CEO Darren Woods is going on the offensive after coming under attack from environmentalists and investors in the first half of his seven-year tenure -- and Wall Street is rewarding his bolder stance. https://t.co/2RRJXvay7c

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 波兰农民开始封锁德国边境附近的一条重要公路，抗议从乌克兰进口粮食和欧盟有关农业的气候倡议
item.description:
Polish farmers started blocking a key highway near the German border to protest against food imports from Ukraine and the European Union’s climate initiatives regarding agriculture https://t.co/duhYBIZKAm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 欧盟承诺向埃及提供 74 亿欧元（81 亿美元）的一揽子援助，这是国际社会为提振埃及苦苦挣扎的经济所做的最新努力
item.description:
The European Union pledged a €7.4 billion ($8.1 billion) aid package for Egypt, the latest push by the international community to buoy its struggling economy https://t.co/NqgtKAKBP4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 南苏丹政府下令全国所有学校无限期停课，因为热浪可能导致气温升高至摄氏 45 度（华氏 113 度）。
item.description:
South Sudan’s government ordered all of the nation’s schools to close indefinitely because of a heat wave that could see temperatures rise to as high as 45C (113F) https://t.co/gSbCcC8Nbp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 汽车尾气排放的新限制、全球近一半经济体的关键利率决定，以及波音公司的困境会如何影响您的夏天。以下是周日简报
item.description:
New limits on auto emissions, key rate decisions for nearly half the global economy and how Boeing's woes could impact your summer. Here's your Sunday Briefing https://t.co/fMGcAnVSjj

item.title: 阿布扎比官员正在悄然策划一套新的福利方案，他们希望这将有助于推动该市跻身世界最大金融中心的行列

item.title: .@kgreifeld的新ETF IQ时事通讯探讨了灰度公司的迷你GBTC计划，尽管最初的GBTC正面临数十亿美元的资金外流。
item.description:

item.title: 食品杂货价格在四年内上涨了 25%，这是美国人对拜登经济不满意的一个重要原因
item.description:
Grocery prices are up 25% in four years and that's a big reason Americans remain unhappy with the Biden economy https://t.co/RwVfGYnZ4N

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 荷兰中央银行行长表示，下一届荷兰政府必须严格控制财政状况
item.description:

item.title: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员 Pablo Hernandez de Cos 表示，如果通胀如预期般继续放缓，他预计 6 月份将降息。
item.description:
ECB Governing Council member Pablo Hernandez de Cos says he expects rates to be cut in June if inflation continues to moderate as anticipated https://t.co/VDpY7b04Uh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 前沿市场已开始积极转变政策，本币债券投资者也开始从中获益。

item.title: 波音公司 2024 年灾难性的开局正波及航空公司，生产延误加剧了单通道喷气式飞机的短缺。
item.description:
Boeing’s disastrous start to 2024 is spilling over to airlines as production delays exacerbate a shortage of single-aisle jets https://t.co/ys3DO81E2C

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 这位 57 岁的对冲基金经理利用自己的科学知识，开发出一套交易巨灾债券的制胜法宝--由于气候变化和通货膨胀，巨灾债券市场正在蓬勃发展。阅读《大手笔》 ⬇️
item.description:
This 57-year-old hedge fund manager used his scientific knowledge to develop a winning formula for trading catastrophe bonds — a market that’s booming thanks to climate change and inflation.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ https://t.co/xux3mFAauI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 17, 2024

item.title: 英国央行将就利率问题做出重大决定，并可能暂时按兵不动。以下是周日简报。
item.description:

item.title: 威尼斯的一家五星级酒店可能是其破产所有者 Signa Prime Selection AG 的债权人挽回部分损失的最佳机会之一
item.description:
